dcterms:description: A fully-cooperative environment where agents perceive the environment from their own perspective and cooperate to reach different destinations without colliding with each other.
dcterms:title: Spread_3

dcterms:description: A fully-cooperative environment with a larger number of agents, where they must cooperate to reach different destinations without colliding with each other.

Yi Wu

dcterms:description: A mixed cooperative-competitive environment where predators cooperate to catch preys while the preys try to escape, with obstacles randomly placed in the environment.
dcterms:title: Predator_3-prey_1

dcterms:description: A more complex mixed cooperative-competitive environment with a larger number of predators and preys, where the dynamics of cooperation and escape are tested.
dcterms:title: Predator_6-prey_2
